item.title: Typeorm
item.description: 在typeorm里orderby 使用 coalesce 函数 const q = this.announcementRepository.createQueryBuilder( 'announcement', ); q.orderBy(`COALESCE(announcement.scheduled_at, announcement.updated_at, announcement.created_at)`, 'DESC') //这么写 会报错 "COALESCE(`announcement" alias was not found. Maybe you forgot to join it? //要先addselect 添加alias 然后 q.orderBy(`COALESCE(announcement_scheduled_at, announcement_updated_at, announcement_created_at)`, 'DESC') 真的是无语了,为啥typeorm 连个orderByBaw的方法都没有,自带的raw方法返回的是FindOperator???
